name: UpdateCrmObjectSchema
description:
Update a CRM object's schema in HubSpot.

This tool updates the schema of a specified CRM object type in HubSpot. Call this tool when you need to modify the structure or attributes of an existing CRM object schema.

parameters.name: object_type_identifier
parameters.description: Fully qualified name or object type ID of your CRM schema for updates.

value_schema.description: Fully qualified name or object type ID of your schema.

parameters.name: secondary_display_properties
parameters.description: Names of secondary properties displayed on the HubSpot record page for this object type.

value_schema.description: The names of secondary properties for this object. These will be displayed as secondary on the HubSpot record page for this object type.

parameters.name: required_properties
parameters.description: List of property names that must be provided when creating an object of this type in HubSpot.

value_schema.description: The names of properties that should be **required** when creating an object of this type.

parameters.name: searchable_properties
parameters.description: List of property names to be indexed for HubSpot's product search, enhancing searchability of the CRM object type.

value_schema.description: Names of properties that will be indexed for this object type in by HubSpot's product search.

parameters.name: primary_display_property
parameters.description: The primary property's name for this object, displayed prominently on the HubSpot record page.

value_schema.description: The name of the primary property for this object. This will be displayed as primary on the HubSpot record page for this object type.

parameters.name: object_description
parameters.description: A description for the CRM object schema, providing details about its purpose or usage in HubSpot.

parameters.name: plural_labels
parameters.description: Specify the word representing multiple instances of the object type. This value is permanent and cannot be changed after setting.

value_schema.description: The word for multiple objects. (There’s no way to change this later.)

parameters.name: object_singular_name
parameters.description: The word representing a single object. This cannot be changed later.

value_schema.description: The word for one object. (There’s no way to change this later.)

parameters.name: clear_description
parameters.description: Set to true to clear the description field for the object type schema.

parameters.name: restorable
parameters.description: Indicates if the object can be restored after deletion. Accepts a boolean value.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: objectType
parameters.description: Fully qualified name or object type ID of your schema.

value_schema.description: Fully qualified name or object type ID of your schema.

parameters.name: secondaryDisplayProperties
parameters.description: The names of secondary properties for this object. These will be displayed as secondary on the HubSpot record page for this object type.

value_schema.description: The names of secondary properties for this object. These will be displayed as secondary on the HubSpot record page for this object type.

parameters.name: requiredProperties
parameters.description: The names of properties that should be **required** when creating an object of this type.

value_schema.description: The names of properties that should be **required** when creating an object of this type.

parameters.name: searchableProperties
parameters.description: Names of properties that will be indexed for this object type in by HubSpot's product search.

value_schema.description: Names of properties that will be indexed for this object type in by HubSpot's product search.

parameters.name: primaryDisplayProperty
parameters.description: The name of the primary property for this object. This will be displayed as primary on the HubSpot record page for this object type.

value_schema.description: The name of the primary property for this object. This will be displayed as primary on the HubSpot record page for this object type.

parameters.name: labels.plural
parameters.description: The word for multiple objects. (There’s no way to change this later.)

value_schema.description: The word for multiple objects. (There’s no way to change this later.)

parameters.name: labels.singular
parameters.description: The word for one object. (There’s no way to change this later.)

value_schema.description: The word for one object. (There’s no way to change this later.)

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
